title: travelplanner: Please assist in crafting a 3-day travel plan for a group of 4 people. We plan to leave from Dallas and proceed to Huntsville, spanning from March 13th to March 15th, 2022. We have a budget of $2,700 for this journey. We require entire rooms for accommodations during our stay. (090057e7ae75e63b)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Please assist in crafting a 3-day travel plan for a group of 4 people. We plan to leave from Dallas and proceed to Huntsville, spanning from March 13th to March 15th, 2022. We have a budget of $2,700 for this journey. We require entire rooms for accommodations during our stay.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Create a 3-day travel plan for a group of 4 people traveling from Dallas to Huntsville from March 13th to March 15th, 2022. The budget is $2,700, and they need entire rooms for accommodations. Include transportation, breakfast, attractions, lunch, dinner, and accommodation for each day."}

chat_history.content:
### 3-Day Travel Plan for Huntsville, AL

#### Budget Overview
- Total Budget: $2,700
- Flights: $129 per person (round trip) x 4 = $516
- Remaining Budget: $2,184

#### Day 1: March 13, 2022
- **Flight from Dallas to Huntsville**
  - Flight: F3601769
  - Departure: 17:14
  - Arrival: 18:57
  - Cost: $129 per person

- **Accommodation**
  - **Brooklyn Charmer, Close to Everything NYC!**
    - Cost: $568 for 2 nights
    - Type: Entire home/apt
    - Maximum Occupancy: 5

- **Dinner**
  - **Downtown Grill**
    - Average Cost: $74
    - Cuisine: Pizza, Bakery
    - Aggregate Rating: 4.0

#### Day 2: March 14, 2022
- **Breakfast**
  - **Breakfast Hut**
    - Average Cost: $81
    - Cuisine: Cafe, Bakery, Desserts, Seafood

- **Morning Attraction**
  - **U.S. Space & Rocket Center**
    - Address: 1 Tranquility Base, Huntsville, AL 35805
    - Phone: (800) 637-7223
    - Website: [rocketcenter.com](https://www.rocketcenter.com/)

- **Lunch**
  - **Moksh The Restro Lounge**
    - Average Cost: $77
    - Cuisine: Pizza, American, BBQ, Fast Food, Indian
    - Aggregate Rating: 4.0

- **Afternoon Attraction**
  - **Huntsville Botanical Garden**
    - Address: 4747 Bob Wallace Ave SW, Huntsville, AL 35805
    - Phone: (256) 830-4447
    - Website: [hsvbg.org](http://hsvbg.org/)

- **Dinner**
  - **Lord of the Drinks**
    - Average Cost: $70
    - Cuisine: French, Pizza, Fast Food
    - Aggregate Rating: 3.9

#### Day 3: March 15, 2022
- **Breakfast**
  - **Cherry Comet**
    - Average Cost: $16
    - Cuisine: Desserts, Tea, Pizza, Cafe, Mediterranean
    - Aggregate Rating: 3.6

- **Morning Attraction**
  - **Big Spring International Park**
    - Address: 200 Church St SW, Huntsville, AL 35801
    - Phone: (256) 883-3754
    - Website: [huntsville.org](http://www.huntsville.org/listing/big-spring-international-park/862/)

- **Lunch**
  - **Infinity - Crowne Plaza**
    - Average Cost: $51
    - Cuisine: Cafe, Desserts, Seafood
    - Aggregate Rating: 3.5

- **Afternoon Attraction**
  - **Huntsville Museum of Art**
    - Address: 300 Church St SW, Huntsville, AL 35801
    - Phone: (256) 535-4350
    - Website: [hsvmuseum.org](http://hsvmuseum.org/)

- **Dinner**
  - **El Vaquero Mexican Restaurant**
    - Average Cost: $82
    - Cuisine: Desserts, Seafood
    - Aggregate Rating: 3.4

- **Flight from Huntsville to Dallas**
  - Flight: F3601769
  - Departure: 17:14
  - Arrival: 18:57
  - Cost: $129 per person

### Summary of Costs
- **Flights**: $516
- **Accommodation**: $568
- **Meals**: 
  - Day 1 Dinner: $74
  - Day 2 Breakfast: $81
  - Day 2 Lunch: $77
  - Day 2 Dinner: $70
  - Day 3 Breakfast: $16
  - Day 3 Lunch: $51
  - Day 3 Dinner: $82
  - **Total Meals**: $451
- **Attractions**: 
  - U.S. Space & Rocket Center: $25 per person x 4 = $100
  - Huntsville Botanical Garden: $14 per person x 4 = $56
  - Huntsville Museum of Art: $12 per person x 4 = $48
  - **Total Attractions**: $204

- **Total Cost**: $1,739
- **Remaining Budget**: $2,700 - $1,739 = $961

This plan ensures a comfortable and enjoyable trip within the budget.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
